headline: Tracking Ron Baron's BAMCO Portfolio - Q4 2024 Update
summary: BAMCO's latest 13F portfolio grew to $38.69B. Notable stake increases include CoStar Group, Vail Resorts, Hyatt Hotels, and Idexx Labs. See more here.

headline: Arch Capital: Attractive Even With Elevated Cat Losses In 2025
summary: Arch Capital's stock has been volatile, impacted by California wildfire losses, but core business performance remains strong. Read why ACGL is a Buy.
